parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front Suspension Component Failure (Control Arm, Crossmember, and Lower Connector)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of front suspension components can cause loss of vehicle control, wheel separation, and accidents, potentially leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Vibrations or shaking while driving
especially at higher speeds
wheel wobbling or falling off
difficulty steering
pulling to one side
and unusual noises.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Steering and alignment problems can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries, as well as uneven tire wear and reduced vehicle performance.
symptoms: Vibrations in the steering wheel
pulling to one side
difficulty steering
and uneven tire wear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to honor warranty claims and inadequate repairs can lead to continued safety risks, financial burdens, and frustration for vehicle owners.
symptoms: Denial of warranty claims
inadequate repairs
and refusal to acknowledge defects or take responsibility.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the timing chain can cause the engine to stall or shut off, leading to a loss of power and potentially causing an accident.
symptoms: The engine stalls or shuts off
a loud "pop" or noise is heard
the vehicle loses power
the timing chain breaks or fails.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Oil Leaks from Timing Chain Cover Seals
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Oil leaks from the timing chain cover seals can cause damage to the engine and other components, leading to costly repairs and potentially causing an accident.
symptoms: Oil leaks from the timing chain cover
oil drips onto the ground
the engine makes a noise or vibrates excessively.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure Due to Ring Wear
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine failure due to ring wear can cause the engine to seize or stall, leading to a loss of power and potentially causing an accident.
symptoms: The engine stalls or shuts off
the engine makes a loud noise or vibrates excessively
oil pours out of the engine.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature failure of the catalytic converter can cause the vehicle to fail emissions tests, leading to costly repairs and potentially causing environmental harm.
symptoms: The vehicle fails emissions tests
the catalytic converter needs to be replaced prematurely.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Rear main seal failure can cause oil leaks, leading to damage to the engine and other components, and potentially causing an accident.
symptoms: Oil leaks from the rear main seal
oil sprays onto the underside of the car
the engine makes a noise or vibrates excessively.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission problems can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing an accident.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls or loses power
the transmission slips or hesitates
the vehicle has difficulty shifting gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Ignition switch problems can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing an accident.
symptoms: The key gets stuck in the ignition switch
the vehicle stalls or loses power
the ignition switch fails to turn off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine shaking or vibrating can cause the vehicle to lose power and potentially cause an accident.
symptoms: The engine shakes or vibrates excessively
the vehicle loses power
the engine makes a loud noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature brake wear and failure can lead to reduced stopping power, increased risk of accidents, and potential loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: Squeaking and grinding noises when applying brakes
uneven brake pad wear
brake pedal feels soft or spongy
brake pedal sticks to the floor
vibration while braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the air conditioner condenser can cause the air conditioning system to malfunction, leading to discomfort and potential health issues for occupants.
symptoms: Condenser damage behind the fan assembly
failure of the condenser in a consistent location with other failures.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Power Steering and Brake Booster Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the power steering and brake booster can cause loss of control of the vehicle, making it difficult to steer or brake, and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Power assist booster failure while applying brakes
brake pedal goes to the floor
vibration while braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Vehicle pulling to one side can cause loss of control, increased risk of accidents, and uneven tire wear.
symptoms: Vehicle pulls to the right while driving
even after alignment.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine oil leaks and failure can cause engine damage, leading to costly repairs and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Major oil leak
metal shavings in oil
need for new engine.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure of Airbags to Deploy in Crash Situations
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of airbags to deploy in crash situations can lead to serious injury or even fatalities, as the occupants are not provided with the necessary protection to mitigate the impact.
symptoms: Airbags fail to deploy despite frontal impact
loss of control
or collision
resulting in injuries or fatalities to occupants.
